bug.author: CaseyCarter
bug.description: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/samples/cpp/tutorial_code/ImgProc/changing_contrast_brightness_image/changing_contrast_brightness_image.cpp#L12>https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/samples/cpp/tutorial_code/ImgProc/changing_contrast_brightness_image/changing_contrast_brightness_image.cpp#L12</denchmark-link> imports the contents of namespace std via , and then defines a namespace-scope variable named . This collides with the function <denchmark-link:http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/numeric/special_math/beta>std::beta</denchmark-link> introduced in C++17.
